text: Denzel Justus Morris Dumfries (born 18 April 1996) is a Dutch football player. He plays as a right-back or a right wing-back for Inter Milan and the Netherlands national team. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National cup Europe Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Sparta Rotterdam 2014–15 Eerste Divisie 3 0 0 0 — — 3 0 2015–16 Eerste Divisie 31 1 2 0 — — 33 1 2016–17 Eredivisie 31 1 5 0 — — 36 1 Total 65 2 7 0 0 0 0 0 72 2 Heerenveen 2017–18 Eredivisie 33 3 2 0 — 2 1 37 4 PSV Eindhoven 2018–19 Eredivisie 34 4 0 0 8 0 1 0 43 4 2019–20 Eredivisie 25 7 2 0 12 1 1 0 40 8 2020–21 Eredivisie 30 2 3 1 8 1 — 41 4 Total 89 13 5 1 28 2 2 0 124 16 Inter Milan 2021–22 Serie A 33 5 4 0 7 0 1 0 45 5 2022–23 Serie A 34 1 5 0 12 1 0 0 51 2 2023–24 Serie A 31 4 0 0 5 0 0 0 36 4 2024–25 Serie A 2 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 2 0 Total 100 10 9 0 24 1 1 0 134 11 Career total 287 28 23 1 52 3 5 1 367 33 ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Aruba 2014 2 1 Total 2 1 Netherlands 2018 3 0 2019 6 0 2020 5 0 2021 16 3 2022 12 3 2023 8 0 2024 8 0 Total 58 6 :Scores and results list Aruba's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Dumfries goal.
